name: I Took a Wrong Turn Somewhere, But Luckily I Am a Car Mechanic! - Trijam 203
name_original: I Took a Wrong Turn Somewhere, But Luckily I Am a Car Mechanic! - Trijam 203
description:
My second Trijam entry completed in juuuust about 3 hours.

I initially spent a lot of time writing functions that didn't end up getting used sadly, so a lot of the gameplay lacks polish. I wanted to have each wheel affect the driving model, and for the car to have a health system, and for the spawning to work differently, and, and, and... such is the case with a 3 hour game jam haha

Let me know what you think anyway! I think the game is too random and easy but I'm happy with what I achieved in 3 hours and I tried out a bunch of new stuff.

Really need to start sourcing/making better art than hand-drawing with a mouse

Software used:

Unity3D, Audacity, Photopea.com

All audio assets are royalty free from Pixabay
